item.title: CVE-2024-37498|2024-07-10T17:47:55.943Z -- pauple -- table%20%26%20contact%20form%207%20database%20%E2%80%93%20tablesome
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Pauple Table & Contact Form 7 Database – Tablesome.This issue affects Table & Contact Form 7 Database – Tablesome: from n/a through 1.0.33.
